stories.title: Why Uruguay's Schoolchildren Are Doing So Well in the Pandemic (2021)

stories.text:
Say you're building a web SITE (not a web APPLICATION).

This is a site that simply publishes content. There's no elaborate functionality or interactivity, other than a few web forms. The use cases is "click a link, view a page, click another link, view another page, etc."

Can a full JavaScript UI framework like React or Svelte provide value here? Are they worth the trouble over simple server-side templating/rendering of HTML (SSR)? Why or why not?
stories.title: Ask HN: For one-way publishing websites, are JavaScript UI frameworks helpful?

stories.text: What markets are growing, or will soon be growing rapidly? E.g. (I haven't verified these with data) electric car adoption, orbital space launches, defence spending in EU, vr devices, applications of artificial intelligence.
stories.title: Ask HN: What markets are growing rapidly?
